explains: n. 作业，修习；指定功课，职业培训；课程作业

sentences.en: Coursework accounts for 40% of the final marks.
sentences.cn: 课程作业占最后总成绩的40%。

sentences.en: Coursework is taken into account as well as exam results.
sentences.cn: 除考试结果外，课程作业也要计入成绩。

sentences.en: Some 20 percent of grades are awarded for coursework.
sentences.cn: 课程作业占分数的20%左右。
